description: a(n) is smallest number != a(j)+a(k), j<k.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: S. R. Finch, Are 0-additive sequences always regular?, Amer. Math. Monthly, 99 (1992), 671-673.
formula: Numbers congruent to {1, 6, 8} mod 9 plus the number 12.
mathematica: f[s_List, j_Integer] := Block[{k = s[[-1]] + 1, ss = Union[Plus @@@ Subsets[s, {j}]]}, While[ MemberQ[ss, k], k++]; Append[s, k]]; Nest[ f[#, 2] &, {1, 6}, 65] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 05 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
